description: Multiple Save Slots - 3 manual save slots plus 1 autosave slot with metadata display, create/overwrite/delete operations, and IndexedDB storage management.

userStories.title: Define save slot data structure and storage
userStories.description: As a developer, I want save slot types and storage so that multiple saves can be managed efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: SaveSlotMeta type with: slotId, timestamp, dungeonName, playtime (seconds), floorCount, roomCount, dayNumber, isEmpty
Autosave slot has reserved slotId 'autosave'; manual slots: 'slot-1', 'slot-2', 'slot-3'
Each save stored as separate IndexedDB entry keyed by slot ID
Metadata stored separately for fast listing
Unit tests verify slot CRUD operations
Types use type keyword per project conventions

userStories.title: Create save slot selection UI with save/load/delete operations
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see all save slots and manage saves through a clear UI.
acceptanceCriteria: SaveSlotsComponent (standalone, OnPush) displays all slots with metadata: name, timestamp, dungeon name, playtime, or 'Empty'
Autosave slot visually distinct and labeled 'Autosave'
Empty slots show 'New Save'; occupied slots show 'Overwrite', 'Load', 'Delete' options
Overwrite and delete require confirmation dialogs
Autosave slot cannot be manually deleted
Loading shows confirmation if game in progress; deserializes and transitions to game-play
Total storage usage estimated and displayed; warning if near capacity
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
